item.description:
Cameron Michelis

As a cybersecurity risk professional, I have a deep interest in understanding and managing the evolving threats and vulnerabilities in today’s digital landscape. Over the years, I’ve focused on identifying and addressing security risks, leveraging my background in mathematics, automation, artificial intelligence, and data science to help protect critical systems and information.

I’m particularly fascinated by how technology can be used to enhance security practices. From automating processes to harnessing the power of AI for threat detection, I enjoy finding innovative ways to improve cybersecurity measures and stay ahead of emerging risks.

Get in Touch

Feel free to reach out to me for personal communication via any of the channels below.

  • Email: contact@cameronmichelis.com
  • Phone: +415-993-3431

For matters concerning organizations or agencies I am affiliated with, please use their appropriate official channels.

item.title: API Documentation
item.description:
Welcome to the API documentation for services hosted at api.cameronmichelis.com. Below are the available API endpoints, their functionality, and the authentication requirements. If you’re interested in accessing a protected APIs, feel free to contact me to request an API key.

Public Endpoints (No Authentication Required)

1. GET /v1/echo

https://api.cameronmichelis.com/v1/echo

Description: The Echo service risk scores the request details sent by the client, including the HTTP method, headers, query parameters, and body (if present). This is useful for testing and debugging API requests.
